title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about giving milk to someone

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving milk to someone expresses many good signs that bring many blessings and gifts to the fortuneteller. Milk is the first food that a person eats in his life and its white color is a symbol of happy events, so it is one of the visions that foretells all goodness and joy, but if it turns sour, then this It indicates some dangers that you must pay attention to. Interpretation of a dream about giving milk to someone from a mother. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving milk to a person? In fact, milk is considered a very useful thing, so in a dream it indicates a person who has good health and good physical condition that qualifies him to perform many tasks. From activities and work without feeling exhausted. The color of white milk expresses the qualities of good character, such as a good heart that does not bear any malice or hatred for anyone, no matter what they did to it in the past. In many cases, this vision is an indication of a person with a high degree of knowledge and culture. He benefits people with his knowledge and spreads it among them. If the dreamer sees himself distributing milk or distributing it to passersby, this is an indication that he will create a wonderful project, provide job opportunities, and open the doors of livelihood to many. As for whoever sees himself giving someone milk powder, this indicates his skill and excellence in his profession, Which makes him stand out among his peers and attracts everyone to work with him. Likewise, if he sees himself preparing powdered milk to drink, this means that he will achieve the ingredients for success in his business project, through which he will achieve a lot of profits and gains. If someone gives him spoiled or curdled milk, this means That he will lose a dear friend or end a strong relationship with an important person. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving milk to a person according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that this vision can have many different interpretations, the meaning of which depends on who is giving the milk and who is receiving it, as well as on The form and nature of the milk. If the milk is turbid and spoiled, this indicates the presence of relatives who are safe and reassuring for him, but who deceive him and harm him. If he is the one who gives fresh milk, this means that he is famous in the world for his good reputation and piety, and this is the reason why everyone loves him and is close to him. If the dreamer finds someone giving him milk, this is a sign that he will start a new life full of joy, comfort, and luxury, especially since he has suffered a lot recently. While a person who sees someone giving him warm milk, this means that he will achieve great success in this business project of his that he started And he will gain a lot of profits and fame for himself. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait for it.. Google Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about giving milk to a person. This vision often indicates that she will soon marry a religious man of good character and achieve happiness and a stable life with him. It also indicates that she feels remorse. She has committed some sins, and wants to purify her heart by repenting to the Creator for what she did in the past. While she sees someone giving her a large cup of fresh milk, this is a sign of many good things. She can obtain a source of livelihood that will provide her with many benefits.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman giving birth without marriage from Ibn Sirin: good or bad skin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a single woman without marriage Girls wake up from their insistence, wanting to know the most prominent interpretations and symbols entered Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a single woman without marriage, especially since it is one of the dreams that causes distress and anxiety for the girl. It jumps through the stage of love and engagement, then marriage and pregnancy to reach the stage of birth, the stage of hardship that God Almighty mentioned in His noble verses. Seeing birth in a dream for a single woman without marriage is a promising vision in many interpretations. While it can differ in its interpretations depending on the vocabulary surrounding it. Entering the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a single woman without marriage at the beginning of her bright life. As God blesses a single woman with an engagement or marriage to a righteous person in reality. Perhaps seeing the birth of an unmarried woman without writing a marriage contract suggests that; A good transformation in her life, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. So, what does the vision of a single child giving birth to a girl, a boy, or twins symbolize? This is what we mean: Seeing a single woman giving birth in a dream about twins symbolizes goodness and blessing if she gives birth to females, and God knows best. On the other hand, seeing the birth of male twins is not an auspicious dream. Especially since it shows the many obstacles and difficulties that an unmarried woman faces in a dream, and God knows the unseen. In addition, seeing the birth of twins, a male and a female, in one dream indicates. The date of her engagement is approaching for happiness, but she may face obstacles, God knows best. Also, seeing the birth of triplets in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the abundance of wealth and lawful wealth that God has bestowed upon her, and God knows best. Seeing the birth of a man in an unmarried woman’s dream is interpreted as the new life she lives, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin explained the vision of birth in an unmarried woman’s dream for a group of interpretations that we consider as follows: It is a vision of birth without pregnancy in a woman’s dream. Good news and the fulfillment of dreams that she has long desired come true, and God knows best. They symbolize the vision of an unmarried woman giving birth to a male child in a dream. The blessings that God has given her in reality, especially happiness in the worlds, are fulfilled, God willing, and the Lord is higher and more knowledgeable. Seeing a birth that seemed difficult with severe pain in a woman’s dream is interpreted as: bearing worries and responsibilities without sharing with others, and trying to hide these worries, and God knows best. Seal Seeing the birth of an ugly child in a single dream who – which; God tests her with tests of determination and patience in her life, so she faces difficulties, but God gives her the will, determination and patience to overcome adversity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an unmarried woman by Al-Nabulsi The scholar Sheikh Al-Nabulsi pointed out the symbols and connotations of seeing an unmarried woman giving birth in a dream, so we refer to them as follows: Nutrition, repentance, forgiveness and many good things are the meanings of seeing the birth and birth of a single person in a child in a dream. According to the great scholar Al-Nabulsi. The problems and difficulties that she faces in reality and in her life are signs of

title: Interpretation of a dream about a threat from a familiar person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a threat from a known person in a dream In case you want to know what the interpretation of a dream about a threat from a known person in a dream brings, we will show in the following lines all of this and much more..Interpretation of a dream about a threat from a familiar person in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a threat A familiar person in a dream could be an indication of marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a single young man sees a threat from a familiar face, it could lead to marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees a threat from a well-known person, this may indicate marriage, and God knows best. While the threat It may express anxiety, for God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about someone threatening me with a scandal in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone threatening me with a scandal in a dream could be a warning sign to stop sinning, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When the dreamer sees someone threatening him, he warns him against sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees someone threatening her This indicates that he is warning her against sins, and God Almighty knows. If an unmarried girl sees someone blackmailing her, this may indicate bad friends, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a threat from an unknown person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a threat from an unknown person in a dream could be an indication of a warning from Sin and God is higher and more knowledgeable, as it may be a reference to a warning to repent, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the threat from an unknown person, he may refer to Satan if he threatens to pray or read the Qur’an, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone in a dream It could be the interpretation of a dream about someone distorting my hearing In a dream, it is a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees in a dream someone slandering my reputation, this may indicate that there is a problem, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees someone smearing my reputation, this may be evidence of sadness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone slandering his reputation, he may He resorts to worries, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my image with magic in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my image with magic in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing magic can lead to marriage to an evil person, and God knows the unseen. When you see magic, it can indicate a naive personality who does not think about actions. And God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that she is bewitched, this may indicate that she is thinking and preoccupied with someone, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about taking revenge on someone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that taking revenge on someone in a dream could be a sign of weakness, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate Weak character, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a single girl, taking revenge on someone can lead to weak character, and God knows the unseen. While you see someone taking revenge on you, this indicates a conspiracy, and you must be careful, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know taking revenge on me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know Taking revenge on me in a dream could be an indication of confusion between good and evil, and God knows the unseen. Revenge can also indicate committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that a married man sees revenge

title: Interpretation of seeing many birds in the sky in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing many birds in the sky in a dream: Birds are a type of animal that is distinguished by its ability to fly, while there are many types of birds that can be classified as unable to fly in the sky continuously or over long distances due to their attractiveness. Weight, but it is characterized by the characteristics and characteristics of birds, but seeing birds in a dream can convey to the dreamer a lot of people, they can be happy or sad. Interpretation of seeing many birds in the sky in a dream Birds are beautiful animals that can be relaxing to look at in the sky as they dance With its small size from one place to another, the interpretation of seeing many birds in the sky was interpreted as follows: - It showed many news that the dreamer will receive in his next life. Also, if a single girl eats birds, this is one of the signs of the song that she will live. While watching the girl eat them In birds, which is one of the signs of her marriage to a rich man. Also, the many birds in the bachelor’s house are one of the many signs of happy news that she will hear. The many birds above the dreamer’s head also showed the goodness and benefit that he will receive. Ibn Sirin also explained that the bird’s beak is a sign of livelihood. The fortune teller. While white birds may indicate relief from distress and anxiety and comfort after distress for the forerunner. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard or beard in a dream from the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about seeing migratory birds in the sky. Birds may migrate from one season to another to many countries. She searches for the climate that suits her and lives in it, and dreams of seeing migratory birds in the sky. It included the following interpretations and evidence: It is one of the mysterious matters for the monarch, and it also concerns him. It has also been interpreted by many commentators as one of the signs of the fortuneteller’s increased food. While the birds, which are famous for their large size , indicates the abundance of sustenance and abundance for the Lord in his coming days. Also, birds that migrate and return again, in a dream, indicate the loss of money or work for the dreamer. While if it appears to the Lord, that birds can fly over his head, then this It indicates that angels are guarding him everywhere. A bird that falls into the dreamer’s hand during his journey is considered a sign of happiness that the dreamer acquires. Whereas if a fortuneteller sees an unknown bird and does not know its name, this may indicate the Angel of Death. A mirage that contains birds The color black carries a sign of the dreamer’s bad morals. Like many birds in the sky that carry the color black, the enemy elements are present in the dreamer’s life but far from him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about going for Hajj in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a strange bird attacking me. It is possible for birds to attack people and harm them. Not all birds are safe and do not harm people. Interpretation of a dream about a strange bird attacking me may indicate the following indicators: A bird attacking a married woman is one of the signs that she will live a happy and joyful life. Also, the presence of flying birds is

Like many birds in the sky that carry the color black, the enemy elements are present in the dreamer’s life but far from him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about going for Hajj in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a strange bird attacking me. It is possible for birds to attack people and harm them. Not all birds are safe and do not harm people. Interpretation of a dream about a strange bird attacking me may indicate the following indicators: A bird attacking a married woman is one of the signs that she will live a happy and joyful life. Also, the presence of flying birds is

title: Interpretation of slaughtering a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and fear among some, for fear of the repercussions that will negatively affect life. Accordingly, dream interpreters have confirmed that the interpretations in general are not the same, but they are determined by a large number of factors today, through our website. joellemena, we will point out the most clear indications and interpretations of the vision. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream. If the dreamer suffers from a lack of money, then slaughtering a sheep in a dream is a clear indication of following a broad diet and the abundance of goodness that will arrive in his life in the coming days. Seeing blood Dripping from the sheep at the time of slaughter is a clear sign that many good things will happen in the dreamer’s life, and God Almighty will give him peace of mind. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is a good dream that symbolizes the magnitude of the dreamer’s sustenance, especially if he is poor. The dream generally symbolizes victory over Enemies, but if there is a rivalry between the dreamer and a person that has lasted for many years, then the vision indicates the end of that rivalry soon. But if the dreamer has recently committed many sins and actions that anger God Almighty, then the vision shows sincere repentance, and God knows best. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream for a son Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a sheep in a dream is a dream that carries more than one meaning and more than one interpretation. The most important of them are as follows: Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will wage war in the coming days, knowing that victory will be in his favor. Slaughtering a sheep in the legal way in a dream is a clear sign that the dreamer is a righteous and pure personality who wants to get closer to God Almighty. He is exalted by good deeds. Slaughtering a sheep at home is evidence that the family will have a new child. The dream also heralds the end of the sad periods of the dreamer’s life and the transition to a much better stage with a lot of goodness and food. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream for unmarried womenIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a sheep Slaughtering her mother, the vision here portends a lot that she will receive in her life, knowing that blessings in general will come to her life. Slaughtering a ram in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her close marriage to a righteous person, and God knows best. Among the interpretations highlighted by Ibn Sirin is that the dreamer will reach Soon she will achieve true happiness, and she will be able to achieve all her aspirations. A ram in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her good morals, and that she wants to repent for all the wrong deeds she has committed. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is evidence that the dreamer bears a great responsibility in her life, Because in the end, she will be able to achieve all her goals. Seeing a sheep being slaughtered in the dream of an unmarried woman, and she was suffering from instability in her life, is a sign that security will overwhelm her life. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of slaughtering a sheep is evidence that God God Almighty will carry her soon. Also, the dream foretells that God Almighty will grant her well-being and well-being. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream for a married woman is a sign of the collapse of the marriage.

title: Seeing grilled fish in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: But our discussion today from gptafser.com/ is to look at grilled fish in the world of dreams and the meanings and messages it conveys. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream for a single girl When a single girl sees grilled fish in a dream. This is good news that she will marry a man who has a lot of money. But if the girl sees that she is eating fish in a dream. This indicates that he is striving to reach the high position that he wants and hopes for, God willing. And the girl who catches fish in a dream is good news. He will live a comfortable life full of prosperity, and he will have money, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see grilled fish in a dream Interpretation of watching grilled fish in a dream for a married woman Seeing grilled fish in a dream for a married woman. It is a good sign of the comfortable life she lives, and it also leads to a life full of comfort and prosperity. Preparing and cooking fish in a dream, this dream shows the dinner and the good life that this woman enjoys. God also gives her many blessings in her home, and also indicates the stability she enjoys. When a married woman sees thorns in the fish in a dream. Unfair to her because it indicates the presence of enemies in Her life. And you should always pray to God with supplication so that it is not harmed, and God knows best. Seeing grilled fish in a dream for a married woman. A sign that she suffers from many worries and problems in her life as well. If the grilled fish is full of thorns in a dream. A sign of envy coming from many people. It must be fortified and the remembrance and legal ruqyah must be maintained. Seeing grilled fish for a married woman may be good news that she and her husband will receive a lot of good from God. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man dreams of seeing grilled fish. It indicates that he will gain a wide trade, or that he will reach a high position, God willing. Seeing fish in a dream is a good vision. It indicates that this person is looking for lawful food and lives in peace and stability. Dreaming of catching fish from the sea. This symbolizes the many blessings in this man's life. And the work of work, and the righteous and just wife, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. When a man eats grilled fish in a dream. Good news for the rest of his life after he was tired and the disappearance of the anxiety that steals his comfort. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of manual fishing for a pregnant woman The meaning of seeing grilled fish in Pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation Eating fish in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will undergo an easy and smooth birth, God willing. The previous dream may have another meaning, which is the life that this woman enjoys in comfort and prosperity. It also indicates that she is in good health, God knows best. When a pregnant woman eats fish in a dream. It indicates that her marital relationships and life achieve stability and enjoy it, thanks to God. Eating grilled fish in a dream for a pregnant woman and enjoying its wonderful taste. This indicates that she will give birth to good offspring and she and her husband will respect her, God willing. Buying grilled fish in her dream indicates that she will have a safe birth

title: Interpretation of gold in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Many of us dream of gold, which makes them wonder about the interpretation of gold in a dream, its meaning, and its importance. Every dream has its interpretation according to the dreamer, his circumstances, and the events of the dream. It was stated in the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin that seeing gold in a dream is an undesirable vision, due to the dislike of its words and the yellowness of its color. Interpretation of gold in a dream includes the interpretation Gold in a dream in general is the following, as stated on the siteVarious: The interpretation of a dream about stealing gold portends a bad event that will happen soon, whether at work or in the family. The theft of gold in a dream by a person known to the dreamer is interpreted as benefiting the thief, but if If the thief is unknown, there is imminent harm that will affect you. With regard to the interpretation of the dream of gold buried in the ground, this indicates the abundant sustenance that the dreamer will obtain in his life, and the dreamer seeing in his dream that he is burying gold in the ground, this indicates the great greed that the dreamer has in his life. And that he wants to take away all the good things from him. As for the dream interpretation of white gold and seeing it in a dream differs in its connotations from yellow gold, seeing and carrying white gold is evidence that the dreamer owns something valuable and preserves it and may indicate the presence of a strong person who keeps you in your life. Seeing him selling white gold is not at all welcome and indicates that the dreamer is ignoring something very important in his life, such as his wife, children, or work. Seeing white gold, and not taking it, indicates that the dreamer owns important and valuable things, but does not know their value. Ibn Sirin says that seeing white gold in a dream is an expression of opportunities in life and the dreamer’s ability to benefit from them and keep them. If you see yourself buying white gold and storing it or burying it in the ground, this is a sign of keeping opportunities and using them well. Getting a gift of gold in The dream indicates success and excellence in life, as well as an expression of achieving goals in the future. If an unmarried girl sees someone offering her a white gold ring, this indicates good luck in her life if she accepts it. Interpretation of a dream about gold by Ibn Sirin. It appeared in Ibn Sirin’s Interpretation of Dreams The interpretation of gold in a dream is an unwanted vision. Because of the dislike of his speech and the yellow color of it, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as follows: A dream about gold indicates anxiety and sadness. If the dreamer wears a gold bracelet, it is a sign of the inheritance that will fall into his hands, and whoever sees that he is wearing something of gold will marry an unsuitable person. Whoever strikes on an alloy of Gold, this is evidence of the loss of his money, or his fear while striking the gold, or the sultan’s anger at him and imposing a fine on him. If a person sees in a dream that his eyes are like gold, then the interpretation of that is that his sight has gone. Whoever sees his house gilded or made of gold will have A fire inside him. Whoever sees himself wearing a necklace of gold or silver, beads, or jewelry, this is evidence that he will be granted a mandate and will be entrusted with a trust. Whoever sees himself wearing two bracelets of gold or silver, something bad will happen to him, and silver is better than gold in a dream. Whoever sees himself wearing gold or silver bicycle,

title: Interpretation of a dream about bees and seeing a bee sting and killing bees

preview.html: I see bees in a dream for single women, married women, welders, divorced women, men, bees are chasing me, stinging, a bee is chasing me, a bee is attacking me, I dreamed of a bee chasing me, from Ibn Sirin by Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of bees in a dream. Bees in a dream indicate good things in terms of nutrition, women and children. In symbology, it is a fruitful and valid work. [And your Lord revealed to the bees, “Make houses in the mountains and in the trees and in what they erect.] The Great God is real, and this is a tribute to this wonderful creature and one of God’s miraculous signs. Bees in the interpretation of dreams promise success after great effort and fatigue. Bees in a dream indicate spiritual gifts. . And when you dream of bees, it can be an indication that you are ready to realize the treasures within you. There are different possible interpretations of bees in a dream, such as increased communication, work, and production. And the ability to consciously choose topics related to our lives. Interpretation of bees in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of bees in a dream is a rich person who disturbs a person, and whoever extracts honey from him will receive legitimate money. It can also indicate the longevity of the person who dreams of bees. Interpretation of bees in a dream in Nablus: Whoever sees bees falling on his head will attain rule or kingship. What if the farmer got fertile land? Whoever sees himself killing bees indicates that he will defeat an enemy. Whoever takes honey from the bee hive earns legitimate money. If he takes honey and leaves nothing for the bees, then he will make a people wrong. And if any ruler sees that bees have gathered on him and stung him, people will work together to harm him. Interpretation of bees in a dream by Ibn ShaheenBees in a dream refer to a person with a confused face, and indicate profit and abundance of blessings. Whoever sees that he is infested with many bees will obtain a lot of spoils. Whoever sees that he is stung by bees shows that after putting in a lot of effort, he will obtain legitimate money. Whoever dreams that he kills a bee means that he will suffer a huge loss. If the ruler sees that he took something from the beehives, this indicates his injustice to his subjects. Interpretation of bees in a dream for a single woman: To see bees in a single woman’s dream is safety, security, and good company. Also, bees dream of a single woman in a new home, and it was said that she will get married soon, which is her success in Life, and the bee. Good news, and a bee sting is a blessing that comes to her or a wish that comes true, and bees in an unmarried woman’s dream are testimony to the goodness of her heart, the purity of her bed, and the greatness of her honor and morals. Interpretation of seeing bees in a pregnant woman’s dream. Bees in a pregnant woman’s dream are evidence of the safety of the pregnancy and her fetus, and it is a promise of a male baby. A bee in a dream for a pregnant woman. Its benefits make things easier after hardships, and a bee in a pregnant woman’s dream is a wish that comes true. Interpretation of bees in a dream for a married woman. Seeing bees in a dream for a married woman brings many blessings. It was also said that pregnancy is an indicator of the stability of the home, and bees in a married woman’s dream are a symbol of happiness and in it blessing. Honey indicates the goodness that prevails in the home and family, and the appearance of bees in the...

title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing here a bicycle made of gold with gold, and God knows best, where he sleeps in prison, illness, or chains, and God knows best. As for whoever sees gold in his dream, in its raw form, this indicates that the sleeper will discover or discover Indeed, a new talent that he loves. Interpretation of seeing gold signs in a dream. Whoever sees pure gold signs in a dream, these signs usually carry an interpretation that the sleeper will achieve great success. Interpretation of seeing a solid block of gold. Whoever sees in his dream a solid and strong piece of gold, this solid piece usually indicates The sleeper ignores his work and the important things that can change the course of his life forever. As for whoever sees that he is wearing two bracelets of gold and silver, they carry bad tidings, and evil will happen to the sleeper, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gold fish in a dream: The dream of a gold fish is one of the common dreams at the Gate of Gold. And it is good skin because it indicates success and success. Interpretation of seeing gold for women. But if a woman sees that she is wearing a golden crown, the interpretation of the dream is that she will marry a very rich man, but he is cruel, unfair, and unfair to her. But if a woman sees that she dreams of a golden plate, but it breaks, This means that one of the people or patients around her will die. Different interpretations of gold in dreams. Whoever sees in his dream that his eye turns into gold here means that the sleeper will lose his sight, and God knows best. And whoever sees in his dream that his hand has become gold, the interpretation of the solution means that something bad will happen to him. He may lose the ability to move his hands. As for the one who dreams that he is trying to hide gold, this indicates that the sleeper is trying to hide some secrets. But if the merchant sees that he is carrying a golden crown over his head, then gold here indicates that the merchant will lose his business unfortunately. As for the one who dreams that the word gold has changed, this means that God knows the deficiency or deficiency of goodness and blessing in food, children, or wife. Unfortunately, gold in a dream is one of the things that carries bad and harmful interpretations and the chances of problems arising or appearing or losing people or losing people or changing. The situation goes from good to bad.
